name: Mystical Mirror Necklace
description:
Mirror, Mirror on the wall, who is the fairest of them all? That would be YOU!

I took a regular mirror and gave it a treatment to give it that aged and antique look. It is placed into an antiqued brass frame and hand polished for a lovely understated look. The addition of vintage Swarovski crystals in a topaz color and genuine peach moonstone add to it's allure and mystical qualities. It comes on an antiqued brass chain with a moonstone at it's clasp. You determine the length, please indicated if you would like 16", 18", 20" or another length in the message to seller box.

The pendant itself measures 1 1/4" (3.5cm) across.

Although the components are new, they have been aged to give it a definite vintage feel.

name: White Orchid - Frosted White Sea / Beach Glass Pendant with White Topaz and Keishi Pearls
description:
Sophistication meets earthly elements. A gentle teardrop shaped piece of natural beach glass wrapped in sterling silver and beautiful white keishi pearls with faceted white topaz centers. The trail of pearls remind me of white orchids, giving a hint of softness and femininity along with the organic strength of the sea glass.

Perfect for a beach wedding, that special outfit or your signature piece.

Pendant measures just over 1 1/2" (4.5cm)and has a large bail.

name: Minty Meringue - Seafoam Beach / Sea Glass Accented with Keshi Pearls and Genuine Apatite
description:
Another of Mother Nature's found treasures made even more beautiful and alluring. Natural Sea / Beach glass accented with white keishi pearls with genuine faceted apatite bead centers which match the glass perfectly.

Reminiscent of delicate and fragrant hibiscus flowers, the pearl and apatite accent lends just the right touch for that beach wedding, or that summer outfit where nothing else will do.

Organic meets sophistication in this pendant, and perhaps eco friendly as well, since the glass I collect is off the beaches near where I live and where I've traveled.

The pendant measures 2" (5cm)in length, is carefully framed in Argentium sterling silver and is crafted to last a lifetime.

name: Confetti Confection - White Beach / Sea Glass Pendant in Argentium Sterling Silver with Cubic Zircon
description:
A fun, yet elegant piece of natural beach glass with my own special twist. Frosted white sea glass, lovingly tossed by the waves and cradled in the sands of time it has evolved into it's own special treasure. I've woven silver threads of wire and accented with tiny, multicolored cubic zirconia beads to give an extra bit of sparkle. Silver is Argentium sterling silver. Just shy of 1 1/2", 3.5cm.

Definitely one of a kind, as sea glass varies like the stars, infinite in shape and size. Similar techniques may be used, but never will the same exact piece ever be duplicated again.
